reviewText: I loved Akshay in this mystery. I was wondering up until the end. A change from his Bollywood movies, But I thought he was great and the story line was good. All around GREAT movie and acting. Good job.

Possibly the most frightening movie I have ever seen. It is filled with suspense. A real whodunit! While I was in shock from the revelation in the movie, even more happened that shook me up.
This is not a bloodbath, cheap, horror film. It is a well-thought out mystery that I was not able to guess in the first few minutes like so many movies. It surprised me.
I may have to invest in a teddy bear to watch it again. It's just that good.

akshay really does his thing. I think there should be a number 2 maybe. It picked up like 1000 degrees towards the end. I'm an American and I'm a complete fan of Bollywood! I can't even watch anything American anymore, it does nothing for me
